dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of pairs of integers used for training a two-layer MLP to learn the modular addition operation, where the network is trained to learn a rule such as z = (m + n)%p.
dcterms:title: Modular Addition Dataset

dcterms:description: A widely used dataset for handwritten digit recognition, utilized in experiments to study the effects of label corruption on model performance.
dcterms:title: MNIST Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of pairs of integers used for training a two-layer MLP to learn the modular multiplication operation, similar to the modular addition dataset.
dcterms:title: Modular Multiplication Dataset
